title: Sketchbook Folio, "Study of Water between Two Hills (recto); Study of Waves in Calm Ocean (verso)", 1870–85
title_raw: Study of Water between Two Hills (recto); Study of Waves in Calm Ocean (verso)
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
dimensions:
Recto:  8.2 x 13.6 cm (3 1/4 x 5 3/8 in.), irregular
Verso: 9.2 x 12.6 cm (3 5/8 x 4 15/16 in.), irregular
Sheet: 12.8 x 19.2 cm (5 1/16 x 7 9/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: In left foreground, a narrow strip of water extending back. To its left, in middleground, a small hill with bushes. To the right of the hill, in foreground, a second small hill, with trees [recto]; Calm ocean across foreground, with small waves [verso].

tombstone.epitaph: Sketchbook Folio, "Study of Water between Two Hills (recto); Study of Waves in Calm Ocean (verso)", 1870–85. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-86-51.
